Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is characterized in high performance and high temperature exhaust, and it has potential to reach 70% efficiency if combined with gas turbine engine (GT).
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: Because the SOFC is in developing stage, it is too expensive to obtain.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: This paper proposes a feasibility study by using a burner (Comb A) to simulate the high temperature exhaust gas of SOFC.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: The second burner (Comb B) is connected downstream of Comb A, and preheated hydrogen is injected to simulate the condition of sequential burner (SeqB).
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: A turbocharger and a water injection system are also integrated in order to simulate the situation of a real SOFC/GT hybrid system.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: The water injection system is used to simulate the water mist addition at external reformer.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: Results show that this configuration can simulate the SOFT/GT hybrid system successfully.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: Water mist addition will increase the GT rotational speed, but an optimal amount exists during the variation of water injection.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: In residual fuel addition test, hydrogen shows good combustion efficiency and preheating temperature is the dominant parameter for hydrogen burning in SeqB even without flame holding mechanism in it.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: When preheating temperature is among 450-600 degrees C, hydrogen will have almost 100% combustion efficiency at 90% engine loading, and GT will get a higher rotational speed for the same energy input.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: But when the engine operates at 100% loading, the combustion efficiency will decrease while fuel utilization (U-f) setting is increasing.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system

Sentencas: When raising the preheated temperature to 650-700 degrees C, the combustion efficiency will increase rapidly.
Titulo: Experimental simulation on the integration of solid oxide fuel cell and micro-turbine generation system
